actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-655, by Mr. Gordon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5350 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. It shall be in order to consider the bill in the House. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order. It shall be in order to consider an amendment offered by Mr. Rostenkowski. All points of order against the bill and amendment for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 5(a) of rule XXI are waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 141.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 284 - 131 (Roll no. 311).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 285 - 126 (Roll no. 312).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5350) to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5350 (public debt limit).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5350) to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit.
